mapper.select: select q.id as id, q.project as project, q.evaluation as evaluation, q.candidate as candidate, q.created_dt as created_dt, q.status as status, f.id as feedback_id, f.need_improve as feedback_need_improve, f.questionnaire_id as feedback_questionnaire_id, f.strengths as feedback_strengths, f.weaknesses as feedback_weaknesses from sphinxex.questionnaires as q left join sphinxex.feedbacks f on q.id = f.questionnaire_id order by created_dt desc
select q.id as id, q.project as project, q.evaluation as evaluation, q.candidate as candidate, q.created_dt as created_dt, q.status as status from sphinxex.questionnaires as q where id = #{id}

select q.id as questionnaires_id, q.evaluation as questionnaires_evaluation, q.created_dt as questionnaires_created_dt, q.project as questionnaires_project, q.candidate as questionnaires_candidate, q.status as questionnaires_status, at.id as answer_topic_id, at.name as answer_topic_name, at.evaluation as answer_topic_evaluation, at.questionnaire_id as answer_topic_questionnaire_id, aq.id as answer_question_id, aq.point as answer_question_point, aq.answer as answer_question_answer, aq.evaluation as answer_question_evaluation, aq.subject as answer_question_subject, aq.links as answer_question_links, aq.level as answer_question_level, aq.answer_topic_id as answer_question_answer_topic_id, f.id as feedback_id, f.need_improve as feedback_need_improve, f.weaknesses as feedback_weaknesses, f.strengths as feedback_strengths, f.questionnaire_id as feedback_questionnaire_id from sphinxex.questionnaires as q left join sphinxex.answer_topics at on q.id = at.questionnaire_id left join sphinxex.answer_questions aq on at.id = aq.answer_topic_id left join sphinxex.feedbacks f on q.id = f.questionnaire_id where q.id = #{id} order by answer_question_point
